metadata.title: CVE-2021-47486 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  riscv, bpf: Fix potential NULL dereference  The bpf_jit_binary_free() function requires a non-NULL argument. When the RISC-V BPF JIT fails to converge in NR_JIT_ITERATIONS steps, jit_data->header will be NULL, which triggers a NULL dereference. Avoid this by checking the argument, prior calling the function.
